description.raw:
otherwise we get these errors:

~~~
_http_outgoing.js:549
    throw new TypeError('first argument must be a string or Buffer');
    ^

TypeError: first argument must be a string or Buffer
    at ServerResponse.OutgoingMessage.end (_http_outgoing.js:549:11)
    at Request.<anonymous> (/var/app/current/server/src/proxy.js:21:13)
    at emitOne (events.js:82:20)
    at Request.emit (events.js:169:7)
    at Request.onRequestError (/var/app/current/node_modules/request/request.js:884:8)
    at emitOne (events.js:77:13)
    at ClientRequest.emit (events.js:169:7)
    at Socket.socketErrorListener (_http_client.js:267:9)
    at emitOne (events.js:77:13)
    at Socket.emit (events.js:169:7)
~~~

title.raw: Prevent portal from crashing due to bad proxy requests
